languages.text: "Ну может быть. Хотя лично вот мы что поделать-то сможем? Торчим тут посередь этой роскоши, тут ни укреплений, ничего — все на внешнем периметре..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Ну сам по суди, там напали на целый боевой корабль и их командакуда боеспособнее чем мы. Я вот думаю, а что мы можем сделать? Мы всего лишь охрана дворца.

languages.text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."
languages.original_text: "Ну может быть. Хотя лично вот мы что поделать-то сможем? Торчим тут посередь этой роскоши, тут ни укреплений, ничего — все на внешнем периметре..."

traits.locale_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."
"Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."
"Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

languages.text: “或许你说得没错，但如果真的发生了这样的事情，我们该怎么办？我们会被困在这个奢华的地方，没有防御工事，什么都没有……所有的一切都在外围区域……”
languages.original_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

traits.locale_text: “或许你说得没错，但如果真的发生了这样的事情，我们该怎么办？我们会被困在这个奢华的地方，没有防御工事，什么都没有……所有的一切都在外围区域……”

languages.text: «A lo mejor tienes razón, pero ¿qué hacemos si sucede? Estamos rodeados de lujo, pero no hay fortificaciones de ninguna clase; todo está en el perímetro exterior...».
languages.original_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor tienes razón, pero ¿qué hacemos si sucede? Estamos rodeados de lujo, pero no hay fortificaciones de ninguna clase; todo está en el perímetro exterior...».

languages.text: 「そうかもな。でも本当に起こったら、俺達はどうする？ここで贅沢な環境に閉じ込められて、防衛設備も何もない。そういうのは、全部外側だ…」
languages.original_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

traits.locale_text: 「そうかもな。でも本当に起こったら、俺達はどうする？ここで贅沢な環境に閉じ込められて、防衛設備も何もない。そういうのは、全部外側だ…」

languages.text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Aber wenn es doch passiert, was machen wir dann? Wir säßen hier im Luxus fest, keine Befestigungen, gar nichts – das ist alles im Außenbereich ..."
languages.original_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Aber wenn es doch passiert, was machen wir dann? Wir säßen hier im Luxus fest, keine Befestigungen, gar nichts – das ist alles im Außenbereich ..."

languages.text: « Tu as peut-être raison. Mais si ça arrivait, on ferait quoi ? On se retrouverait coincés ici, dans cet endroit luxueux, sans fortification ni quoi que ce soit... Toutes les défenses sont sur le périmètre extérieur... »
languages.original_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

traits.locale_text: « Tu as peut-être raison. Mais si ça arrivait, on ferait quoi ? On se retrouverait coincés ici, dans cet endroit luxueux, sans fortification ni quoi que ce soit... Toutes les défenses sont sur le périmètre extérieur... »

languages.text: "Haklı olabilirsin ama öyle bir şey olsa ne yaparız? Tüm bu lüksün ortasında, korumasız, hiçbir şeysiz kalakalırdık. Her şey dış kısımlarda."
languages.original_text: "Maybe you're right. But if it did happen, what would we do? We'd be stuck here in the lap of luxury, no fortifications, nothing — everything is on the outer perimeter..."

traits.locale_text: "Haklı olabilirsin ama öyle bir şey olsa ne yaparız? Tüm bu lüksün ortasında, korumasız, hiçbir şeysiz kalakalırdık. Her şey dış kısımlarda."
